title: FS T206 Chick Gandil PSA 5 SOLD
author: Cy2009

posts.post_title: FS T206 Chick Gandil PSA 5 SOLD
posts.post_content:
The card has been SOLD!


Hi,

I have for sale a T206 Chick Gandil. It is graded PSA 5. This is a very nice card. 

I am asking $310 for the card. I prefer to be paid with a US Postal money order. But if that is a problem, I will accept PayPal or a check.

If you would like to buy it, you can contact me at: [url]cy@cyscards.com[/url]

[IMG]http://www.cyscards.com/t206/picsb/06-177b.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://www.cyscards.com/t206/picsb/06-177rb.jpg[/IMG]

Thanks.

Cy
